'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 1.1]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2020-11-11 10:00:00 &ndash; 2020-12-01 15:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon [[Memory of Dust]] (Catalyst) and the 5-star weapon [[Skyward Harp]] (Bow) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* In this event wish, the 4-star weapons [[The Flute]] (Sword), [[Rainslasher]] (Claymore), [[Eye of Perception]] (Catalyst), [[Rust]] (Bow), and [[Favonius Lance]] (Polearm) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapon will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
